```{r setup, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
## load packages
packs.html <- c("knitr", "pander", "reporttools", "dplyr", "readxl")
for (i in 1:length(packs.html)){library(packs.html[i], character.only = TRUE)}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## read in data
path <- getwd()
source(paste(path, "/functions/inputData.r", sep = ""))
res <- inputData()

test25 <- as.data.frame(read_excel(paste(path, "/data/2025/testimonials2025.xlsx", sep = ""), col_types = NULL))
test25[is.na(test25[, 2]), 2] <- ""
```

To get an idea about the special spirit of the workshop we link a few linkedin posts reflecting on the 2024 issue.

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
tab <- cbind(test25[, 1:2], paste("[link](", test25[, "Link"], ")", sep = ""))
colnames(tab) <- c("Author", "Topic", "Link to post")
kable(tab)
```
